value:
Just because Ferox is split between
east and west, doesn't mean we're at
war. We just...don't always get along.

Basilio and I have tussled more times
than I can count. But now we've both
been ruling khan... Maybe we'll relax.

Your diligence is admirable, but we
all have our limits. Have some warm
soup and a nap. You need it.

What's wrong? You're carrying
a heavy weight on those shoulders. If
you want to talk, I'm happy to listen.

We fight to survive because we all
have something worth protecting.
Can't defend anything if you're dead.

Pleasure to meet you. I'm Flavia,
East-Khan of Regna Ferox, and
friend of $Nf.

Ferox is a kingdom of warriors!
We care not about gender or race—
only about being the strongest!

Soldiers are born on the battlefield!
Steel your resolve, and let your
weapons strike true!

Oof, that one hurt. I don't know if
I should be amused or embarrassed...

This will do me some good, but what
I really need is a reliable champion to
represent me in the next tournament.

I'm Flavia, East-Khan of Regna Ferox.
But enough with formalities.
What say we have some fun?

I've had my eye on you ever since
arriving in Askr. It's difficult not to
notice your strengths. $k$pYou command your armies well and
are sound in body and mind. That's
rare, even in Ferox.$k$pBut what makes you tick? The Askran
royals and other Heroes may hold
the answer.$k$pIt's clear that the bonds you share
with them are key. And so, I say:
let us strengthen ours.$k$pYou're champion material, to be sure.
But it's more than that. You've
the makings of a true friend.
はあっ
潰す！
きゃああっ
やるね…！
Make ready, dog!
Out of my way!
Well?
I'll crush you.
You got me...
ふっ
I am Flavia, East-Khan of Regna Ferox. A pleasure to meet you.
Hey! Trifle with me and you'll live to regret it.
Boast your victory! When you win, make damn sure everybody hears about it.
Robin is quick-witted, bold, and decisive... A superior tactician like that would be most welcome in Regna Ferox.
You know how to talk, don't you? Yes, I like you already.
I'll cut that dastard Walhart down myself! I swear it before the gods!
We've only gotten this far thanks to that clever head of yours. Thanks for having my back.
Leave it to me.
Really?
To victory!
